thread.title: Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception: From Salman Khan to Katrina Kaif, see pics of celeb guests

author: FP Staff
title: Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception: From Salman Khan to Katrina Kaif, see pics of celeb guests
text:
Neil Nitin Mukesh's wedding reception: From Salman Khan to Katrina Kaif, see pics of celeb guests  41:45 IST #Aditya narayan #Amitabh bachchan #Katrina kaif #Mugdha godse #Neil nitin mukesh #Neil nitin mukesh wedding #Neil nitin mukesh wife #Rukmini sahay #Salman khan #Sooraj barjatiya #Sophie choudhary 
Bollywood actor Neil Nitin Mukesh tied the knot with his Rukmini Sahay, in a traditional wedding ceremony in Udaipur on 9 February 2017. The gorgeous couple hosted a lavish wedding reception for their Bollywood friends and family members on Friday evening (17 February). 
From Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, the evergreen Rekha to Sophie Choudry, Sooraj Barjatiya and many others, the film fraternity showed up in strength to wish the newlyweds the very best. The social media handles of the stars and several fan clubs have posted pictures from the starry night. The newlyweds. Image courtesy: PTI 
The couple posed for the press in their complementary beautiful green royal outfits, designed by couturier Manav Gangwani. 

Manav Gangwani said: "Neil is a very dear friend to me and I am delighted to dress the newly weds for their wedding reception." 
"Rukmini's style and sensibility is simple and elegant. Keeping that in mind, the ensemble selected for her reflects simplicity and elegance. Each garment has been tailor-made to perfection. I hope Neil and Rukmini enjoy wearing these outfits as much as I have enjoyed making it for them. Wishing the newly weds all the very best for the future," Gangwani added. Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan pose with Mukesh. Image courtesy: PTI 
Katrina Kaif and Sophie Choudry were present at the reception too. A post shared by Sophie C (@sophiechoudry) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:30pm PST Salman Khan hugs and congratulates Mukesh. Image courtesy: Sachin Gokhale. Mugdha Godse arrives at the reception. Image courtesy: Sachin Gokhale Singer Aditya Narayan along with his father Udit Narayan and mother during the wedding reception of Bollywood actor Neil Nitin Mukesh in Mumbai, India on 17 February 2017. SOLARIS IMAGES Sooraj Barjatya arrives to bless the newlyweds. Image courtesy: Sachin Gokhale 
(Compiled with agency inputs)
